vn.uiza.libstream.uiza.faucamp.simplertmp

Class Crypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.uiza.libstream.uiza.faucamp.simplertmp.Crypto

  • public class Crypto
extends java.lang.Object
    Some helper utilities for SHA256, mostly (used during handshake) This is separated in order to be more easily replaced on platforms that do not have the javax.crypto.* and/or java.security.* packages

    This implementation is directly inspired by the RTMPHandshake class of the Red5 Open Source Flash Server project
